column5: Got out last week on the kayak and had fun with some smaller bass on the topwater frog at sunset. Hoping to get out for some bigger ones this week. Check out the footage of the blowups!

cool vid.  thanks for posting.  have you ever thought of making a power pole type device to keep you stable?  I only ask as that was the 1st thought that ran through my mind on the 1st fish.  Never fished from a 'yak' before is why I ask.

cool vid.  thanks for posting.  have you ever thought of making a power pole type device to keep you stable?  I only ask as that was the 1st thought that ran through my mind on the 1st fish.  Never fished from a 'yak' before is why I ask.  Possibly... I don't do this type of fishing a ton but it would definitely be super helpful.
Possibly... I don't do this type of fishing a ton but it would definitely be super helpful. a long broom stick and a clamp came to mind
Thanks for the vid....going to go buy me some of them frogs for topwater'ing.

Enjoyed the vid. I have the same issue with my session 5. I think maybe the sound is hampered if I dont have the cube set properly in the holder. Can you elaberate on the mic thing you are talking about please.  Thanks for posting
Looks like a good time was had.  Art

Enjoyed the vid. I have the same issue with my session 5. I think maybe the sound is hampered if I dont have the cube set properly in the holder. Can you elaberate on the mic thing you are talking about please.  Thanks for posting  I have an external mic that I use which makes the sound quality much better than the regular GoPro mic. It also has a wind muff that cancels wind noise. I think it got water on it because it started only recording in one speaker, so I went and bought a new one. This only applies though if you don't plan on getting the GoPro wet. If you do, the GoPro mic is really your only option.
NIce video Pbenson  Topwater bassin is about as fun as it gets, i have been catching lots of buzz baits this year. What a blast watching them explode on top.
Thanks, completely agree. Something about the explosions is so addicting. I can't wait to get back out there for more on the yak.
Nice vid dude... top water == good times !!!
